front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for InfiniBand Channel Adapters (CA)

abstract.t: InfiniBand Architecture (IBA) specifies a high speed, channel based, switched fabric architecture that delivers scalable performance in data centers. This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it defines objects for managing InfiniBand Channel Adapters (CA).
